titles.title: Highway Runoff Management Act
A bill to require States to establish highway stormwater management programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
2/12/2015--Introduced. Highway Runoff Management Act
Requires each state to develop for approval a state highway stormwater management program consisting of management measures to prevent, reduce, or control highway runoff from federal-aid highway projects.
Directs the Secretary of Transportation to publish guidance to assist states in the establishment of such measures.
